title: Anglo Italian Quartet - Put It Right Mr. Smoothie (1991)[TNT]
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Album.........................: Put It Right Mr. Smoothie
Genre.........................: Jazz
Year..........................: 1991

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
                      Tracklisting
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

				1, Unda                      8:49
				2. Put It Right Mr Smoothie  8:03
				3. Sing Sing                 4:15
				4. Small Strides             7:47
				5. One Three Nine            8:34
				6. I Wish                    9:20
				7. Small Strides (Live)      10:26

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
                        Credits
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Double Bass..................: Enrico Fazio
Drums........................: Fiorenzo Sordini
Alto Saxophone...............: Elton Dean
Trumpet......................: Harry Beckett
        

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Â«Here the Italian stallion rhythm section (bassist Enrico Fazio and drummer Fiorenzo Sordini) reaches out to embrace Canterbury scenester saxophonist Elton Dean and Brit jazz trumpeter extraordinaire Harry Beckett and the result is a muscular yet lyrical session of high flying tempos, hard swinging blues, and fiery, knotty interactions between frontline and rhythm section. It's the Brits who had to give the most in this session, Dean's elaborately styled playing and phrasing which have served him well with Soft Machine and other jazz and prog rock outfits, has had to be pared back somewhat on this dateÂ». Continue reading review on: http://www.allmusic.com/album/put-it-right-mr-smoothie-mw0000418799
